data.trans_hint: Ông Lê đã thông báo với tôi rằng ông đang rút khỏi hội nghị.
data.en_hint: Mr. Le has informed me that he is withdrawing from the conference.
data.content_game_1: Mr. Le has informed me that he is withdrawing from the conference.
data.answer_en_hint: Mr. Le has informed me that he is withdrawing from the conference.

data.trans_hint: Hóa ra anh ta là một trong những quan chức giấu mặt kiểm soát cuộc sống của chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: It turned out he was one of those faceless bureaucrats who control our lives.
data.content_game_1: It turned out he was one of those faceless bureaucrats who control our lives.
data.answer_en_hint: It turned out he was one of those faceless bureaucrats who control our lives.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy là một công chức 37 tuổi có hai con nhỏ.
data.en_hint: He's a 37-year-old civil servant with two young children.
data.content_game_1: He's a 37-year-old civil servant with two young children.
data.answer_en_hint: He's a 37-year-old civil servant with two young children.

data.trans: (+to sb/sth): Có hại, gây hại, gây bất lợi
data.trans_hint: Sự thay đổi này có thể gây bất lợi nghiêm trọng cho nền kinh tế.
data.en_hint: This change could be seriously detrimental to the economy.
data.content_game_1: This change could be seriously detrimental to the economy.
data.answer_en_hint: This change could be seriously detrimental to the economy.

data.trans_hint: Ông ấy là thị trưởng của hạt này.
data.en_hint: He is the mayor of this county.
data.content_game_1: He is the mayor of this county.
data.answer_en_hint: He is the mayor of this county.

data.trans: Nghị sĩ quốc hội, thành viên Nghị viện
data.trans_hint: Các cử tri tuyên bố phiếu chống cho cựu Nghị sĩ Quốc hội của họ.
data.en_hint: The electors declared against their former Member of Parliament.
data.content_game_1: The electors declared against their former Member of Parliament.
data.answer_en_hint: The electors declared against their former Member of Parliament.

data.trans: Ý niệm, quan điểm, khái niệm
data.trans_hint: Ông đã bác bỏ chính khái niệm thỏa hiệp.
data.en_hint: He dismissed the very notion of compromise.
data.content_game_1: He dismissed the very notion of compromise.
data.answer_en_hint: He dismissed the very notion of compromise.

data.trans_hint: Nữ hoàng Victoria trị vì từ năm 1837 đến năm 1901.
data.content_game_1: Queen Victoria reigned from 1837 to 1901.
data.answer_en_hint: Queen Victoria reigned from 1837 to 1901.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy không còn chuẩn bị trợ cấp cho việc đánh bạc của anh ta nữa.
data.en_hint: She's not prepared to subsidize his gambling any longer.
data.content_game_1: She's not prepared to subsidize his gambling any longer.
data.answer_en_hint: She's not prepared to subsidize his gambling any longer.

data.trans: Người lãnh đạo đảng đối lập
data.trans_hint: Bà đã chỉ trích công khai người lãnh đạo của đảng đối lập.
data.en_hint: She publicly condemned the leader of the opposition.
data.content_game_1: She publicly condemned the leader of the opposition.
